meanings.definition: To climb or ascend by means of a ladder or staircase.
meanings.sent1: I speel up the stairs to my room every night.
meanings.sent2: She will speel the ladder to reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to speel up the slide at the playground.
meanings.sent4: The ivy seemed to speel effortlessly up the brick wall.
meanings.sent5: He watched the spider speel its web from the ceiling to the floor.

meanings.definition: A turn or shift of work; a spell of work.
meanings.sent1: After my speel at the office, I went home to relax.
meanings.sent2: She had a long speel of overtime last week.
meanings.sent3: His speel at the construction site was tiring but rewarding.
meanings.sent4: The chef's speel in the kitchen was filled with creativity.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's speel at the hospital lasted through the night.

meanings.definition: A game or round of play.
meanings.sent1: We had a fun speel of hide and seek in the park.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed their speel of tag during recess.
meanings.sent3: The family's speel of charades turned into a hilarious mess.
meanings.sent4: The soccer team's speel under the lights was intense.
meanings.sent5: The card players began their speel with high hopes.
